appetizers.name: Fried Squidward
appetizers.description: Fresh Atlantian Squid beer battered and fried served with fresh lemon juice and our sweet marinara sauce

appetizers.name: Garlic Knots
appetizers.description: Your choice of 6 or 12 of our fresh, baked-daily knots tossed in Garlic Butter and Parmesan Cheese, served with marinara sauce

cold sandwiches.name: Peanut Butter Jelly Time
cold sandwiches.description: Thick honey infused peanut butter served with your preference of strawberry,grape, or mixed berry preservites

cold sandwiches.name: BLT Sandwich
cold sandwiches.description: Served on toasted bread is a bed of Romaine Lettuce, juicy tomatoes, and our crispy applewood smoked bacon

hot sandwiches.name: Ham and Swiss
hot sandwiches.description: Hot Honey Baked Ham with melted swiss cheese served with a spiced honey mustard on a warm Brioche Bun

hot sandwiches.name: Big Cheese
hot sandwiches.description: A Triple Decker Grilled cheese skyscraper of a sandwhich with a gooey mess of cheese

desserts.name: Cocoa Cake
desserts.description: Gooey chocolate ganache cake with a kick of expresso, served with vanilla bean ice cream

desserts.name: Banana Split
desserts.description: Heaping scoops of our Neapolitean Ice Cream served on a banana complete with traditional toppings of chopped peanuts, chocolate sauce, maraschino cherries

drinks.name: Hakuna Mojito
drinks.description: Refreshing mint and lime is the perfect way to cool down

drinks.name: Shirley T
drinks.description: Adult version of a chilhood favorite
